item.description:
# Why Python Is Great: # In-place value swapping
# Let's say we want to swap # the values of a and b... a = 23 b = 42
# The "classic" way to do it # with a temporary variable: tmp = a a = b b = tmp
# Python also lets us # use this short-hand: a, b = b, a If you think your friends would find this tip useful, please share it with themâIâd really appreciate it. Here's the link: View in browserTo make sure you keep getting these emails, please add info@realpython.com to ...
